New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest ever World Cup century off 40 balls
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell and Pat Cummins put on 103 from 44 balls for the seventh wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell expressed that the record-breaking innings is a huge confidence-booster for him
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glenn Maxwell performed his heroics in front of his wife Vini Raman and young son Logan
